description:
Clean, fresh and elegant music player and flawless Last.fm scrobbler with background scrobbling and cacheing. 

See what users are #NowPlaying around the world at smartplayerapp.com/nowplaying 

- Stunning and clean user interface 
- Fully compatible with iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad in both portrait and landscape in all areas of the app 
- Flawless isolated scrobbles: Use SmartPlayer on as many devices as you want and it won't interfere with scrobbling activity between devices. All scrobbles are contained within the app on each device 
- Offline scrobbling, never miss a scrobble! Any scrobbles that are made offline are stored into an offline cache which you can scrobble later 
- Updates your 'Now Playing' status on Last.fm in real-time. 
- View your Last.fm profile summary in settings 
- WiFi-only data mode 
- Mode to force all scrobbles into offline cache 
- Intuitive gesture-based music controls 
- Integrated social features and 'Love' tracks on Last.fm 
- 100% synced with your Device music library 
- Fully compatible with iTunes Match 
- 'Show All Music' switch for iTunes Match 
- Instantly create quick playlists by swiping tracks and albums 
- Artwork backgrounds blurred to perfection 
- Play counts (as well as other data) are automatically updated. 
- Uses your device's equalisers and gapless playback settings 

Remember: If it doesn't scrobble it doesn't count! 


Support: 

If you're experiencing any problems at all simply contact me shaddeen.com/contact/SmartPlayer. There's no way for me to contact you about the issues you're having if you simply leave a bad review.
trackCensoredName: SmartPlayer - Music Player and Last.fm Scrobbler
trackName: SmartPlayer - Music Player and Last.fm Scrobbler
releaseNotes:
Sorry for the delay in getting this fix out to you all! Your emails haven't been ignored, I just didn't have time to respond to them all.

There will be a new version of SmartPlayer but not anytime soon. This update should fix any problems you're having on iOS 8 as well as some UI improvements.

I don't have all devices to test this on so please get in touch if you have any problems: @shaddeen_ or shaddeen.com/contact/SmartPlayer
